name: SUPER TURKEY BOY
description:
The unthinkable strikes when a family of three settles down for a Thanksgiving meal.

SUPER TURKEY BOY is an 3v1 asymmetric multiplayer game of tag in which each player has a different set of abilities.

Turkey

  • Objective: Stay out of grasp of the Family Members until the Timer runs out. Collect Carrots to decrease the time left.
  • Move with joystick (gamepad) or arrow keys (keyboard)
  • Dash with A (gamepad) or backslash (keyboard)
  • Whirlwind Spin with B (gamepad) or right shift (keyboard) to push enemies away

Father

  • Objective: Work with your family members to catch the Turkey before the Timer runs out.
  • Move with joystick (gamepad) or WASD (keyboard)
  • Swing Net with A (gamepad) or Q (keyboard)

Mother

  • Objective: Work with your family members to catch the Turkey before the Timer runs out.
  • Move with joystick (gamepad) or IJKL (keyboard)
  • Swing Net with A (gamepad) or U (keyboard)
  • Shout with B (gamepad) or O (keyboard) to decrease the Turkey’s speed

Son

  • Objective: Work with your family members to catch the Turkey before the Timer runs out.
  • Move with joystick (gamepad) or TFGH (keyboard)
  • Swing Net with A (gamepad) or R (keyboard)
  • Charge Slingshot Stone by holding B (gamepad) or Y (keyboard) and release to shoot

Created by @onygox, @wengwengweng, @lagravy, and @아
